question: 6.Your friend is going to stay in your apartment while you are away. Write a letter to your friend and include:Where the key isInstructions to look after the apartmentWhat should he/ she do on the day of your return
text: I hope you are well. I am writing this letter to inform you of several things you’ll need to know.
I will give the key to Grace, who is my lovely neighbor. As I have told her you are coming in ten days, she will be waiting for you on 15th June whilst giving you my apartment’s key.

There are two reminders I want to give you. Firstly, one of the lights in the living room was broken down, and I haven’t had enough time to fix it, so you just use other lights. In addition, every time after using the air conditioning, it would be better to check whether you have switched it off or not as the remoter doesn’t work sometimes.

Last but not least, I’ll come back from my hometown before you leave. Because I am not entirely sure whether my flight will be on time or not, you don’t need to wait for me at home. I carry another key with me, which provides convenience and ease for both of us.
I hope you have a wonderful holiday in Melbourne and I am looking forward to meeting you in one month.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of neighbor is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
